dict.acceptation: 报告；成绩报告单；传闻；流言蜚语；

sent.orig: It combines four powerful productivity products (File, Write, Report and Assistant) in a single package.
sent.trans: 该系统是把四个功能强的产品(file,Write,Report,Assistant)组合而成的软件包。

sent.orig: Project quarterly report, annual report, interim report and final report both in Chinese and in English.
sent.trans: 按要求递交中英文的项目季度报告、年度报告、中（终）期报告。

sent.orig: The report modal includes general report, OB report and so on.
sent.trans: 报告模块完成常规报告、产科报告等。

sent.orig: Provide product repairing report and Final analysis report (FAR). Repairing weekly report, Repairing data-base maintenance.
sent.trans: 提供返修品的维修报告，测试报告及每周的维修报告。维修数据库的日常维护管理。

sent.orig: To finish and pack up Daily Sales Order Report, Out of Stock Report, Inventory Report, etc.
sent.trans: 完成当日订单报告数据、缺货报告、库存报告的整理。
